      • convert

        public abstract boolean convert(android.view.View convertCardView)
        Attempt to reuse convertCardView. Should not modify convertCardView if it's not compatible. The implementer should check the card content part and verify that it matches.
        参数:
        convertCardView - the view to convert, with root Id equal to Card.getId()
        返回:
        true on success, false if not compatible
